name: Guardace Power of Lord
description:
Resurrace, the rebellion has come back.
The strongest battle begins among Guardace, Resurrace and Evolserk!

Violent attacks from 3 energy generators.
Superconductive Space Energy Generator.
Anti-matter Energy Generator
Dark-matter Energy Generator

All covered, Solo, Watch, Local multi-player, World multi-player.
In the multi-player, switch the navigator to human or computer at any time.

Can Resurrace succeed in destroying Guardace?
What is the 4th power which only Guardace has?
